vote.title: Adopt a resolution (1) authorizing and approving the creation of a public facility corporation in accordance with the Texas Public Facility Corporation Act, Chapter 303 of the Texas Local Government Code, as amended (“Act”), to be named the Dallas Public Facility Corporation (“Corporation”); and (2) approving the Corporation’s proposed Articles of Incorporation and Bylaws - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Adopt a resolution (1) authorizing and approving the creation of a public facility corporation in accordance with the Texas Public Facility Corporation Act, Chapter 303 of the Texas Local Government Code, as amended (“Act”), to be named the Dallas Public Facility Corporation (“Corporation”); and (2) approving the Corporation’s proposed Articles of Incorporation and Bylaws - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
